original_title: Der Teufel mit den drei goldenen Haaren
overview: When the farm boy Felix is born with a caul, the rumor spreads in no time that this boy can succeed in anything. One day he would even marry the princess - he just has to trust in his own destiny. But the king and alchemist Ottokar, however is obsessed only with gold and wealth, seeks to kill the child, by throwing him in a river.
title: Der Teufel mit den drei goldenen Haaren
